name: Moonshot - Luna Lander
description:
Moonshot: Luna Lander is a space flight sim with survival management where the objective is to land on the moon before the ships systems fail. It was in about 20 days with almost everything being made from scratch. I love the idea and would like to make something more complete someday. It is the first game I have released after having started making games earlier during this hell year that has been 2020.

Support

Follow me on Instagram - I sometimes take photos as well
